page.title: 07 LOCAL TRADE
page.content: In Woolmer Green there are 5 shops and 3 pubs.There is a very old,large sign painted on the side of the Post Office.It says{"W.GATES LATE PEDDAR'S {STORES GROCERIES,PROVISIONS,HARDWARE {etc,CIGARETTES,TOBACCO AND SWEETS AT {MARKET PRICES"}. The shops are used by the local people although most shopping is done in supermarkets in Stevenage. In the Oaklands area, which is 1 km southwards along the B197, there is a parade of 6 shops,1 garage and a pub.A fish and chip shop has only recently been opened.The pub is called the North Star and is situated beside the old Great North Road. The main garage in our area was built in 1900.Its name is now Lisles. They are agents for Bedford,Opal and Vauxhall.The other 2 petrol stations are also owned by the same company.
